text: This is a list of regions of Burundi by Human Development Index as of 2020 with data for the year 2018. {| class="wikitable sortable" ! class="sort" |Rank ! class="sort" |Regions ! class="sort" |HDI (2018) ! class="unsortable" |Comparable countries (2018) |- ! colspan="4" style="color:#900;" |Low human development |- |1 | style="text-align:left" |West (Bubanza, Bujumbura Rural, Cibitoke, Bujumbura Mairie) |0.470 | |- |2 | style="text-align:left" |South (Bururi, Makamba) |0.455 | |- |3 | style="text-align:left" |Middle (Gitega, Karuzi, Muramvya, Mwaro) |0.426 | |- style="background:#e6e6e6" |– | style="text-align:left" | (average) |0.423 | |- |4 | style="text-align:left" |East (Cankuzo, Rutana, Ruyigi) |0.405 | |- |5 | style="text-align:left" |North (Kayanza, Kirundo, Muyinga, Ngozi) |0.376 | |- |} == References == Burundi Human Development Index Category:Burundi-related lists
title: List of regions of Burundi by Human Development Index
